## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Use Case

Why would this feature be useful? What problem does it solve for you?

Example: "I have a large collection of anime series and need to track which episodes I've watched across multiple seasons..."

## Proposed Solution

How do you envision this working? Be as specific as you can.

Example: "Add a 'mark season as watched' option that marks all episodes in a season..."

## Alternatives Considered

Have you thought of other ways to achieve the same goal? What are the pros/cons?

## Additional context

Add any other context, mockups, or examples here. Feel free to reference similar features in other applications.
